original_text: And all the men of might, even seven thousand, and craftsmen and smiths a thousand, all that were strong and apt for war, even them the king of Babylon brought captive to Babylon.
korean_text: 또 용사 칠천 명과 장인과 대장장이 천 명 곧 용감하여 싸움을 할 만한 모든 자들을 바벨론 왕이 바벨론으로 사로잡아 가고

sentences.original_text: And all the men of might
and craftsmen and smiths a thousand
all that were strong and apt for war
even them the king of Babylon brought captive
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 바빌론 왕이 사로잡아 끌고 갔으니
